snippet.title: Pung.io - Play Now - Get Pung'd
snippet.description:
https://pung.io
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.devclied.pungio
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/pung-io/id1558188433

Use your fists to fight. After each fight, you can collect experience points and other in-game currencies in order to upgrade a variety of different stats.


Pung.io is a fun, multiplayer punch .io fighting game. Use your fists to attack other players. In this battle, players must accumulate skills and status.


When you first begin playing the game you start off with 1000 gold, which is a perfect amount to by the mushroom skin, which is brown. This hat boosts your attack by 2.5! The hat only costs 250 which could easily be called a super sale for such a strong skin for beginners.


For skills, the recommendations that people have is to buy "AGILE" boost which is only for 100 gold. This skill generates more speed into your punches. Remember, skills only last for some seconds so only use it when it is urgent.


Once you start progressing in the game and earn up to 5000 gold, you can start to buy very overpowered hats, an example being the Thanos skin. The Thanos and saitama skin are equivalent so which ever you buy would just be for cosmetics.


As for skills, you can also start to buy the portal skill which throws a ton of punches "depends on your agility" at the enemy and it is long range so you can catch the fleeing people. You can also buy the huge machine skill which places you into a machine that fires very strong punches.

#multiplayer #android #ios #apple #strategy #punch
